<h:html xmlns:h="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" xmlns:orx="http://openrosa.org/jr/xforms" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2002/xforms" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:jr="http://openrosa.org/javarosa" xmlns:vellum="http://commcarehq.org/xforms/vellum">
	<h:head>
		<h:title>STEP 1: Register New Water Client</h:title>
		<model>
			<instance>
				<data xmlns:jrm="http://dev.commcarehq.org/jr/xforms" xmlns="http://openrosa.org/formdesigner/62159A0E-1555-4303-AF31-DE30C61EF8BA" uiVersion="1" version="1" name="STEP 1: Register New Water Client">
					<info_label/>
					<current_reading/>
					<consumption/>
					<client_full_name/>
					<number_of_household_members/>
					<full_address/>
					<point_of_reference/>
					<preferred_day_of_payment/>
					<consumer_level/>
					<last_reading_date/>
					<client_status/>
					<last_reading/>
					<client_id/>
				</data>
			</instance>
			<bind vellum:nodeset="#form/info_label" nodeset="/data/info_label"/>
			<bind vellum:nodeset="#form/current_reading" nodeset="/data/current_reading" calculate="0"/>
			<bind vellum:nodeset="#form/consumption" nodeset="/data/consumption" calculate="0"/>
			<bind vellum:nodeset="#form/client_full_name" nodeset="/data/client_full_name" type="xsd:string" required="true()"/>
			<bind vellum:nodeset="#form/number_of_household_members" nodeset="/data/number_of_household_members" type="xsd:int" required="true()"/>
			<bind vellum:nodeset="#form/full_address" nodeset="/data/full_address" type="xsd:string" required="true()"/>
			<bind vellum:nodeset="#form/point_of_reference" nodeset="/data/point_of_reference" type="xsd:string" required="false()"/>
			<bind vellum:nodeset="#form/preferred_day_of_payment" nodeset="/data/preferred_day_of_payment" type="xsd:int" constraint=". <= 31" jr:constraintMsg="jr:itext('preferred_day_of_payment-constraintMsg')"/>
			<bind vellum:nodeset="#form/consumer_level" nodeset="/data/consumer_level" required="true()"/>
			<bind vellum:nodeset="#form/last_reading_date" nodeset="/data/last_reading_date" calculate="today()"/>
			<bind vellum:nodeset="#form/client_status" nodeset="/data/client_status" calculate="'Active'"/>
			<bind vellum:nodeset="#form/last_reading" nodeset="/data/last_reading" calculate="0"/>
			<bind vellum:nodeset="#form/client_id" nodeset="/data/client_id" calculate="uuid(6)"/>
			<setvalue event="xforms-ready" vellum:ref="#form/preferred_day_of_payment" ref="/data/preferred_day_of_payment" value="31"/>
			<itext>
				<translation lang="en" default="">
					<text id="info_label-label">
						<value>**Use this form to record a new client's water contract in your database.**</value>
						<value form="markdown">**Use this form to record a new client's water contract in your database.**</value>
					</text>

						<value>Client's full name:</value>

					</text>

						<value>Location of <output value="/data/client_full_name" vellum:value="#form/client_full_name"/>'s house:</value>
						<value form="markdown">Location of <output value="/data/client_full_name" vellum:value="#form/client_full_name"/>'s house:</value>
					</text>

<h:html xmlns:h="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" xmlns:orx="http://openrosa.org/jr/xforms" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2002/xforms" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:jr="http://openrosa.org/javarosa" xmlns:vellum="http://commcarehq.org/xforms/vellum">
	<h:head>
		<h:title>Terminate Water Contract</h:title>
		<model>
			<instance>
				<data xmlns:jrm="http://dev.commcarehq.org/jr/xforms" xmlns="http://openrosa.org/formdesigner/33B5445F-C713-4A46-958F-724637AE25E8" uiVersion="1" version="1" name="Terminate Water Contract">
					<info_label />
					<confirm_termination />
					<reason_for_terminating_the_contract />
					<contract_termination_date />
				</data>
			</instance>
			<instance src="jr://instance/casedb" id="casedb" />
			<instance src="jr://instance/session" id="commcaresession" />
			<bind vellum:nodeset="#form/info_label" nodeset="/data/info_label" />
			<bind vellum:nodeset="#form/confirm_termination" nodeset="/data/confirm_termination" required="true()" />
			<bind vellum:nodeset="#form/reason_for_terminating_the_contract" nodeset="/data/reason_for_terminating_the_contract" vellum:relevant="#form/confirm_termination = '1'" relevant="/data/confirm_termination = '1'" />
			<bind vellum:nodeset="#form/contract_termination_date" nodeset="/data/contract_termination_date" type="xsd:date" constraint=". >= today()" jr:constraintMsg="jr:itext('contract_termination_date-constraintMsg')" vellum:relevant="#form/confirm_termination = '1'" relevant="/data/confirm_termination = '1'" required="true()" />
			<setvalue event="xforms-ready" vellum:ref="#form/contract_termination_date" ref="/data/contract_termination_date" value="today()" />
			<itext>
				<translation lang="en" default="">
					<text id="info_label-label">
						<value>**Use this form to terminate a client's water contract.**</value>
						<value form="markdown">**Use this form to terminate a client's water contract.**</value>
					</text>
					<text id="confirm_termination-label">
						<value>Are you sure you want to terminate <output value="instance('casedb')/casedb/case[@case_id = instance('commcaresession')/session/data/case_id]/case_name" vellum:value="#case/case_name" />'s contract?</value>
					</text>
					<text id="confirm_termination-1-label">
						<value>Yes</value>
					</text>
					<text id="confirm_termination-0-label">
						<value>No</value>
					</text>
					<text id="reason_for_terminating_the_contract-label">
						<value>Reason for terminating the contract:</value>
					</text>
					<text id="reason_for_terminating_the_contract-no_payments-label">
						<value>Non-payment</value>
					</text>
					<text id="reason_for_terminating_the_contract-client_wants_to_terminate-label">
						<value>Termination requested</value>
					</text>
					<text id="reason_for_terminating_the_contract-other_termination-label">
						<value>Other</value>
					</text>
					<text id="contract_termination_date-label">
						<value>Contract Termination Date</value>
					</text>
					<text id="contract_termination_date-constraintMsg">
						<value>Date of termination must be today or in the future.</value>
					</text>
				</translation>
			</itext>
		</model>
		<vellum:hashtags>{"#case/case_name":null}</vellum:hashtags>
		<vellum:hashtagTransforms>{"prefixes":{"#case/":"instance('casedb')/casedb/case[@case_id = instance('commcaresession')/session/data/case_id]/"}}</vellum:hashtagTransforms>
	</h:head>
	<h:body>
		<trigger vellum:ref="#form/info_label" ref="/data/info_label" appearance="minimal">
			<label ref="jr:itext('info_label-label')" />
		</trigger>
		<select1 vellum:ref="#form/confirm_termination" ref="/data/confirm_termination">
			<label ref="jr:itext('confirm_termination-label')" />
			<item>
				<label ref="jr:itext('confirm_termination-1-label')" />
				<value>1</value>
			</item>
			<item>
				<label ref="jr:itext('confirm_termination-0-label')" />
				<value>0</value>
			</item>
		</select1>
		<select1 vellum:ref="#form/reason_for_terminating_the_contract" ref="/data/reason_for_terminating_the_contract">
			<label ref="jr:itext('reason_for_terminating_the_contract-label')" />
			<item>
				<label ref="jr:itext('reason_for_terminating_the_contract-no_payments-label')" />
				<value>no_payments</value>
			</item>
			<item>
				<label ref="jr:itext('reason_for_terminating_the_contract-client_wants_to_terminate-label')" />
				<value>client_wants_to_terminate</value>
			</item>
			<item>
				<label ref="jr:itext('reason_for_terminating_the_contract-other_termination-label')" />
				<value>other_termination</value>
			</item>
		</select1>
		<input vellum:ref="#form/contract_termination_date" ref="/data/contract_termination_date">
			<label ref="jr:itext('contract_termination_date-label')" />
			<alert ref="jr:itext('contract_termination_date-constraintMsg')" />
		</input>
	</h:body>
</h:html>
